WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is fixed for v2.2.25. As it now no longer exports priorities given lack of ES_SS & MW4_LB etc.
WorkItem.Description:
For an Enhancement Shaman using the Enhance model in Rawr 2.2.24.
 
When I load a saved character, go to the Options tab and then the EnhSim sub-tab, click on Export to EnhSim, the resulting clipboard content contains an invalid rotation:
 
rotation_priority_count         9
rotation_priority1              XX
rotation_priority2              XX
rotation_priority3              XX
rotation_priority4              XX
rotation_priority5              XX
rotation_priority6              XX
rotation_priority7              XX
rotation_priority8              XX
rotation_priority9              XX
 
This is not valid and will break EnhSim if imported into the simulator.
 
This seems only to happen if I Open a saved character XML. If I have an empty profile, use Load From Armory... and load my toon, then click Export to EnhSim the clipboard contains the correct rotation:
 
rotation_priority_count         9
rotation_priority1              SR
rotation_priority2              SW
rotation_priority3              MW5_LB
rotation_priority4              FS
rotation_priority5              SS
rotation_priority6              ES
rotation_priority7              LL
rotation_priority8              MT
rotation_priority9              LS
 
The toon I loaded was "Kam" on "Aszune" EU. I've attached the saved XML file I load to export and find the error.
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] Export to EnhSim has invalid rotation after loading Opening character
